about_the_game:
Demo Content

Welcome Riders! The demo for Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders invites you to hit the slopes of the first two trails of the Lonely Mountain "Tannenstein" in Solo Mode. Zen and Team Mode are locked for the Demo and only one type of ski is available. The progression and customization items are limited at level 10 and have been adjusted to offer a larger variety in a shorter time. Quickmatch tours feature only two trails. Leaderboards are available.

About the Main Game

Take a deep breath, count to three, and… go! Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders is a game about skiing down gorgeous mountain vistas. Slice through deep snow, skitter over ice lakes, and leap into the air in spectacular jumps, all surrounded by a variety of breathtaking landscapes.

Snow Riders also adds a brand new feature to the Lonely Mountains world – online multiplayer! Work your way down the mountain as a team in co-op, adding save points as you go, or compete in a breakneck race to the base in versus mode. Available for 2-8 players.

Perform daredevil tricks or try to best your time for a spot on the leaderboard. Or you can take the road less traveled, discovering shortcuts as you explore the slope. Unlock new equipment, outfits and tricks as you play!

Whether you’re looking for a challenge or a chilled-out vacation with friends, Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders is the perfect winter getaway.

Welcome Riders! The demo for Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders invites you to hit the slopes of the first two trails of the Lonely Mountain "Tannenstein" in Solo Mode. Zen and Team Mode are locked for the Demo and only one type of ski is available. movies.name: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders - Announcement Trailer

name: Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 Ti / AMD Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These specifications are subject to change.

reviews:
“Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders is a slick ski 'em up, if its demo is any indication”
Rock Paper Shotgun

“Lonely Mountains Is Even Better With Snow”
aftermath

“What stands out from the get-go is just how brilliantly Lonely Mountains: Snow Riders can recapture its predecessor's same thrills”
gamesradar+
short_description: Test your skiing skills in serene mountain scenery. Perform tricks, discover shortcuts and try to best your time in the snowy followup to Lonely Mountains: Downhill. Enjoy the slopes alone, participate in 2-8 person online multiplayer races or gather your friends and conquer the mountains together.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
